stateDiagram

state ORDER_MENU {

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as ORDER_MENU.(InitialState)

        state FOOD {

                %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
                %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
                state "." as FOOD.(InitialState)

                SANDWICH

                SANDWICH : SANDWICH

        }

        state ORDER_MENU.(ChoicePoint)(FOOD__Mermaid_StateSmith_Issue_512__0) <>

}

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

ORDER_MENU.(InitialState) --> FOOD

FOOD --> ORDER_MENU.(ChoicePoint)(FOOD__Mermaid_StateSmith_Issue_512__0) : MY_EVENT

FOOD.(InitialState) --> SANDWICH

ORDER_MENU.(ChoicePoint)(FOOD__Mermaid_StateSmith_Issue_512__0) --> FOOD

ROOT.(InitialState) --> ORDER_MENU
Events
settings delete help
